content: I cannot predict the future or guarantee any player's performance for the remainder of the season. however, michail antonio has made a fantastic start to the premier league campaign, and his early-season form is certainly impressive. if he continues to score goals and provide assists for west ham, he could be a key player for the team this season. that said, there is still a long way to go in the season, and many factors such as injuries and changes in form could impact his performance in the future.
